Tartarus

elijah who

08 Oct 2018

Today has been a really rough day, but I whine enough in this blog, so I wanna talk about something positive instead. After listening to some lofi hip-hop while trying to work, I remembered elijah who.

His(?) music is super relaxing, and made it easier to get through the day relatively meltdown-free. Cheers, elijah.
